basics.name: Benton Snyder
basics.label: Lead Python Developer
basics.summary: Results-driven leader with 10+ years of experience designing and developing scalable applications and microservices. Proven success in building and leading high-performance teams to deliver impactful solutions and measurable business outcomes.

work.name: Centene Corporation
work.summary: Lead Python developer for an agile team with multiple applications, APIs, and microservices.
highlights: Led multiple projects, developers, contractors, and vendor integrations.
Owned the full SDLC for multiple applications and microservices using Django, Flask, and FastAPI.
Modernized legacy applications including Python 2 to 3, sync to async, and on-prem to AWS.
Replaced batch processes with real-time events using Kafka and CometD.
Containerized applications using Docker, Artifactory and Kubernetes.
Created and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Gitlab.

work.name: Cybercon Incorporated
work.summary: Developed multiple websites, plugins and services using Python and PHP.
highlights: Designed and developed multiple Joomla, WordPress, and Magento websites and plugins.
Developed service automation scripts to provision, manage, and audit the data center, products and services using Ansible and Fabric.
Designed and developed company's client portal with integrations into multiple vendors and systems using Django and API client libraries.

work.name: MDNetLink
work.summary: Developed websites and plugins using Joomla and PHP.
highlights: Designed and developed multiple Joomla websites and extensions.

work.name: Gartman Technical Services
work.summary: Developed websites and plugins using Joomla and PHP.
highlights: Designed and developed multiple Joomla websites and extensions.

awards.title: Performance Bonus
awards.summary: Led major project for a new client portal within a condensed timeline that included multiple vendor and system integrations.

awards.title: Performance Bonus
awards.summary: Volunteered technical assistance for a major project in response to a government audit.

awards.title: Performance Bonus
awards.summary: Led a major project to overhaul the commission structure in response to marketplace fraud, completing it from notice to delivery within 4 weeks.
